verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת־ <S%H8141><s%> In the year מוֹת֙ <S%H4194><s%> died הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that king עֻזִּיָּ֔הוּ <S%H5818><s%> Uzziah וָאֶרְאֶ֧ה <S%H7200><s%> I saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> also אֲדֹנָ֛י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> sitting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֖א <S%H3678><s%> upon a throne רָ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> high וְנִשָּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> and lifted up וְשׁוּלָ֖יו <S%H7757><s%> and his train מְלֵאִ֥ים <S%H4390><s%> filling אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַהֵיכָֽל׃ <S%H1964><s%> the temple

שְׂרָפִ֨ים <S%H8314><s%> the seraphims עֹמְדִ֤ים ׀ <S%H5975><s%> it stood מִמַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H4605><s%> Above ל֔וֹ שֵׁ֧שׁ <S%H8337><s%> had six כְּנָפַ֛יִם <S%H3671><s%> wings שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six כְּנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> wings לְאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> each one בִּשְׁתַּ֣יִם ׀ <S%H8147><s%> with twain יְכַסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> he covered פָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> his face וּבִשְׁתַּ֛יִם <S%H8147><s%> and with twain יְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> he covered רַגְלָ֖יו <S%H7272><s%> his feet וּבִשְׁתַּ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> and with twain יְעוֹפֵֽף׃ <S%H5774><s%> he did fly

וְקָרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> And one cried זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> and one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> another וְאָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto another and said קָד֧וֹשׁ ׀ <S%H6918><s%> Holy קָד֛וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> holy קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> holy יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts מְלֹ֥א <S%H4393><s%> [is] full כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the whole earth כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> of his glory

וַיָּנֻ֙עוּ֙ <S%H5128><s%> moved אַמּ֣וֹת <S%H520><s%> And the posts הַסִּפִּ֔ים <S%H5592><s%> of the door מִקּ֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> at the voice הַקּוֹרֵ֑א <S%H7121><s%> of him that cried וְהַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> and the house יִמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> was filled עָשָֽׁן׃ <S%H6227><s%> with smoke

וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֽוֹי־ <S%H188><s%> I Woe לִ֣י כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because נִדְמֵ֗יתִי <S%H1820><s%> [is] me for I am undone כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> because I [am] a man טְמֵֽא־ <S%H2931><s%> of unclean שְׂפָתַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8193><s%> lips אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> I וּבְתוֹךְ֙ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> of a people טְמֵ֣א <S%H2931><s%> of unclean שְׂפָתַ֔יִם <S%H8193><s%> lips אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> and I יוֹשֵׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> and I dwell כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Because אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the King יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts רָא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> have seen עֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> for mine eyes

וַיָּ֣עָף <S%H5774><s%> Then flew אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> then אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַשְּׂרָפִ֔ים <S%H8314><s%> of the seraphims וּבְיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand רִצְפָּ֑ה <S%H7531><s%> unto me having a live coal בְּמֶ֨לְקַחַ֔יִם <S%H4457><s%> with the tongs לָקַ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> [which] he had taken מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> from off the altar

וַיַּגַּ֣ע <S%H5060><s%> And he laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פִּ֔י <S%H6310><s%> [it] upon my mouth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָגַ֥ע <S%H5060><s%> Lo this hath touched זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂפָתֶ֑יךָ <S%H8193><s%> thy lips וְסָ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> is taken away עֲוֹנֶ֔ךָ <S%H5771><s%> and thine iniquity וְחַטָּאתְךָ֖ <S%H2403><s%> and thy sin תְּכֻפָּֽר׃ <S%H3722><s%> purged

וָאֶשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> Also I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> of the Lord אֹמֵ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Whom אֶשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> Whom shall I send וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> and who יֵֽלֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> will go לָ֑נוּ וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> for us? Then said הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> am I שְׁלָחֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7971><s%> I Here [am] I send

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and tell לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear שָׁמ֙וֹעַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> ye indeed וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּבִ֔ינוּ <S%H995><s%> but understand וּרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> not and see רָא֖וֹ <S%H7200><s%> ye indeed וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> but תֵּדָֽעוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> but perceive

הַשְׁמֵן֙ <S%H8080><s%> fat לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> Make the heart הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> of this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of this וְאָזְנָ֥יו <S%H241><s%> and make their ears הַכְבֵּ֖ד <S%H3513><s%> heavy וְעֵינָ֣יו <S%H5869><s%> their eyes הָשַׁ֑ע <S%H8173><s%> and shut פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Otherwise יִרְאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> lest they see בְעֵינָ֜יו <S%H5869><s%> with their eyes וּבְאָזְנָ֣יו <S%H241><s%> with their ears יִשְׁמָ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear וּלְבָב֥וֹ <S%H3824><s%> with their heart יָבִ֛ין <S%H995><s%> and understand וָשָׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> and convert וְרָ֥פָא <S%H7495><s%> and be healed לֽוֹ׃

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> Then said עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֖י <S%H4970><s%> how אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> I Lord וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> how long? And he answered עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo שָׁא֨וּ <S%H7582><s%> be wasted עָרִ֜ים <S%H5892><s%> Until the cities מֵאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> without יוֹשֵׁ֗ב <S%H3427><s%> without inhabitant וּבָתִּים֙ <S%H1004><s%> and the houses מֵאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> are without אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> without man וְהָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> and the land תִּשָּׁאֶ֥ה <S%H7582><s%> desolate שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <S%H8077><s%> be utterly

וְרִחַ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> far away יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> men וְרַבָּ֥ה <S%H7227><s%> and [there be] a great הָעֲזוּבָ֖ה <S%H5805><s%> forsaking בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וְע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Yet בָּהּ֙ עֲשִׂ֣רִיָּ֔ה <S%H6224><s%> But yet in it [shall be] a tenth וְשָׁ֖בָה <S%H7725><s%> and [it] shall return וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> be to לְבָעֵ֑ר <S%H1197><s%> and shall be eaten כָּאֵלָ֣ה <S%H424><s%> as a teil tree וְכָאַלּ֗וֹן <S%H437><s%> and as an oak אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Whose בְּשַׁלֶּ֙כֶת֙ <S%H7995><s%> [is] in them when they cast מַצֶּ֣בֶת <S%H4678><s%> whose substance בָּ֔ם זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [their leaves so] the holy מַצַּבְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H4678><s%> [shall be] the substance פ
